all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
The works, and the designs, and the purposes of God cannot be frustrated, neither can they come to naught.
Doctrine and Covenants 3:1
Quote of the Day
"Does your birthright mean you are chosen? Yes, but not chosen to rule over others; you are chosen to serve them."
Bradley R. Wilcox | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
